title: Player Development Programs
subtitle: Elite football development pathways for aspiring professionals aged 14-21. Train in Portugal and Spain with top-level coaching staff.

programs.title: Elite Development Camps
programs.description: Intensive training camps in Portugal and Spain. Professional coaching methodology, tactical development, physical conditioning, and competitive match play.
programs.features: Professional coaching staff, Video analysis sessions, Physical testing & monitoring, Competitive matches, Cultural immersion

programs.title: Professional Club Trials
programs.description: Arranged trial periods with Liga Portugal and La Liga partner clubs. Professional assessment, showcasing opportunities, and direct club exposure.
programs.features: Liga Portugal club trials, La Liga partner access, Professional assessment reports, Agent introductions, Follow-up support

programs.title: International Player Pathway
programs.description: Complete relocation and integration program for international players looking to develop in the Portuguese or Spanish football ecosystem.
programs.features: Visa & documentation support, Club placement assistance, Language classes, Accommodation arrangement, Academic support

programs.title: Summer & Easter Intensives
programs.description: Short-term intensive programs during school holidays. Perfect for international players seeking high-level development experiences.
programs.features: 1-4 week programs, All-inclusive packages, Airport transfers, Professional facilities, Certificate of completion
